mapper.select: SELECT G.GICODE, M.MICODE, G.GINAME, M.MINAME, B.BAM, B.BNOTE, G.GINAME FROM BOM B JOIN MATINFO M ON B.MICODE = M.MICODE JOIN GOODSINFO G ON B.GICODE = G.GICODE WHERE G.GICODE = #{gicode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOM WHERE GICODE=#{gicode} AND MICODE=#{micode}
mapper.select: SELECT BCODE BOM번호, GICODE 제품코드, MICODE 자재코드, BAM 사용량, BNOTE 비고 FROM BOM ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(GICODE), MICODE
